name: Abdominals
description: Rectus abdominis muscles, commonly known as 'abs'

name: Abductors
description: Hip abductors and outer thigh muscles

name: Adductors
description: Hip adductors and inner thigh muscles

name: Biceps
description: Muscles on the front of the upper arm

name: Calves
description: Gastrocnemius and soleus muscles on the back of the lower leg

name: Cardio
description: Exercises focused on cardiovascular endurance

name: Chest
description: Pectoral muscles including the pectoralis major and minor

name: Forearms
description: Muscles in the lower arm responsible for wrist, hand and finger movement

name: Glutes
description: Gluteus maximus, medius, and minimus

name: Hamstrings
description: Muscles on the back of the thigh

name: Hip Flexors
description: Muscles that help you lift your knee toward your body and bend at the waist

name: Lats
description: Latissimus dorsi, large muscles of the mid and lower back

name: Lower Back
description: Erector spinae and lower back muscles

name: Neck
description: Muscles supporting and moving the head and neck

name: Obliques
description: Side abdominal muscles that help rotate and bend the torso

name: Quadriceps
description: Muscles on the front of the thigh

name: Rhomboids
description: Mid and upper back muscles between the shoulder blades

name: Rotator Cuff
description: Shoulder stabilization muscles

name: Shoulders
description: Deltoid muscles including the anterior, lateral, and posterior heads

name: Shins
description: Tibialis anterior muscles on the front of the lower leg

name: Traps
description: Trapezius muscles of the upper back and neck

name: Triceps
description: Muscles on the back of the upper arm
